description:
If you're looking to enter or upgrade your stance in the Android marketplace, then this is the course for you.

In this course, you learn the skills to build more complex apps using Android Marshmallow. It doesn't matter of you're a complete newbie or an expert. You can go from knowing no code, to being able to confidently code any app you can dream of.

From basics to high level code, you'll know how to code the app of your dream, and be able to SHARE it in Google store Store if you want.

You will work with the latest version of Android Studio (android 2.0 preview) and use the latest Android version (6.0 Marshmallow)

You've made it this far, take the time to invest in yourself and your future, enroll today!
title: Build a Complete eCommerce Application: Android Marshmallow
